amendment.description: To require a National Academy of Sciences study on alternative technologies for conventional munitions demilitarization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4293 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4293 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Baldwin. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3488-3489) To require a National Academy of Sciences study on alternative technologies for conventional munitions demilitarization.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4293 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4293 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Baldwin.
